test.name: Cenário 1: Pesquisar produto por um id válido

kw.name: DADO que o usuário inicie a sessão na API do serverest
kw.doc: Inicia a cessão na API do serverest

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=serveRest, url=https://serverest.dev, headers={'Content-Type': 'application/json'}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: E realize o cadastro no sistema
Criar dados do usuário
kw.doc: Cria um dicionário com os dados do usuário

kw.name: Password
kw.doc: Generate a random password of the specified ``length``.

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Set Suite Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current suite.

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: POST On Session
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: POST Request : url=https://serverest.dev/usuarios path_url=/usuarios headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.28.1', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate, br', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Content-Length': '104'} body=b'{"nome": "Jack Clark", "email": "jrusso@example.net", "password": "+s2NbXHvY1", "administrador": "true"}'

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: QUANDO o usuário receber o Token
Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: POST On Session
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: POST Request : url=https://serverest.dev/login path_url=/login headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.28.1', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate, br', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Content-Length': '57'} body=b'{"email": "jrusso@example.net", "password": "+s2NbXHvY1"}'

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Dictionary Should Contain Item
kw.doc: An item of ``key`` / ``value`` must be found in a ``dictionary``.

kw.name: Get From Dictionary
kw.doc: Returns a value from the given ``dictionary`` based on the given ``key``.

kw.name: Set Suite Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current suite.

kw.name: E realizar a requisição do produto ${_id}
kw.sourcename: E realizar a requisição do produto ${_id}
kw.doc: Realiza uma requisição informando o id do produto no path do endpoint

kw.name: GET On Session
kw.doc: Sends a GET request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: GET Request : url=https://serverest.dev/produtos/K6leHdftCeOJj8BJ path_url=/produtos/K6leHdftCeOJj8BJ headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.28.1', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate, br', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=None

kw.name: Então o sistema deve retornar um json com o produto relacionado ao id pesquisado
kw.doc: Verifica se o produto retornado está correto e se o código é 200.

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.
